text: Watee nyan geukheun jak keunan ligat Nanggroe nyoe teumpat gata geukeubah Peue-peue nyang hawa tapajoh ligat Ampon Hadharat talakee bagah Takheun hiththatun peubuet ibadat Tatamong ligat sujud bak Allah Kamoe peuampon dachateuh ligat Bandumteuh meuhat hana le salah Soe nyang peubuet got meutamah lom that Kamoe Hadharat keybit that Murah
